member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_RATIONAL
member.summary: The DISPLAYCONFIG_RATIONAL structure describes a fractional value that represents vertical and horizontal frequencies of a video mode (that is, vertical sync and horizontal sync).

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_RATIONAL.Numerator
member.summary: The numerator of the frequency fraction.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_RATIONAL.Denominator
member.summary: The denominator of the frequency fraction.
